actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for a national program to conduct and support activities toward the goal of significantly reducing the number of cases of overweight and obesity among individuals in the United States.

summary.text:
Promoting Healthier Lifelong Improvements in Food and Exercise Act of 2020 or the LIFE Act

This bill requires the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to carry out a national program to conduct and support activities to reduce the number of cases of overweight or obese individuals in the United States. The activities must include training health professionals, educating the public, and developing and demonstrating intervention strategies for use at work-sites and in community settings.

titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for a national program to conduct and support activities toward the goal of significantly reducing the number of cases of overweight and obesity among individuals in the United States.
Promoting Healthier Lifelong Improvements in Food and Exercise Act of 2020
